EmailTemplate.name: JCOM Notification email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Execution_Plan_Name__c} - {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Execution__c} project plan - Requires JCOM Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!User.Name} updated {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Execution_Plan_Name__c} project plan
Click this link https://fed.ko.com/freestyle to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
